testcase.classname: registration user should be able to sign up with new accounts
testcase.name: user could sign up with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user press registration link............................................passed When user fills Personal Details with valid data and password...............passed And user press on register button...........................................passed Then user register successfully.............................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user press login link...................................................passed When user enter valid Email and password....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed

testcase.name: user can change his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user press login link...................................................passed When user click on forget password link.....................................passed And user fills Email correctly..............................................passed Then user click on recover button...........................................passed And user will see successfully message Email with instructions has been sent to you.passed

testcase.classname: search for any item by item's name
testcase.name: user can search for any item by item's name
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user press login link...................................................passed When user enter valid Email and password....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed Given user navigate to home page............................................passed When user press on search field.............................................passed And user search with Item name"book"........................................passed And user press on search button.............................................passed Then user could find relative result........................................passed

testcase.name: User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user press login link...................................................passed When user enter valid Email and password....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed Given user navigate to home page............................................passed When user click on the currency list........................................passed And user change currency to Euro............................................passed Then user found all items prices in Euro....................................passed When user click on the currency list........................................passed And user change currency to us-dollar.......................................passed Then user found all items prices in us-dollar...............................passed

testcase.name: user can hover in categories and subcategories and click in subcategory
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user press login link...................................................passed When user enter valid Email and password....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed Given user navigate to home page............................................passed When user hover in categories...............................................passed And user hover in subcategories and click in one............................passed Then user navigate to subcategory page......................................passed

testcase.name: user make successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user press login link...................................................passed When user enter valid Email and password....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Given user could add items to shoppingCart..................................passed When user go to Shopping cart...............................................passed Then user found the chosen items in shoppingCart............................passed When user click on Terms and condition checkbox.............................passed And user click on checkout button...........................................passed Then user complete order confirmation process...............................passed And user finally complete order and see "Your order has been successfully processed!".passed
